    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">企业可观测性架构分析（聚焦架构优化、业务有效应用与效率提升）</span>

            <div class="postBody">

<p><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>当前文档为博主<strong>分析</strong>当前公司可观测性相关能力过程中痛点与架构的思考，希望能为广大博友带来一些架构帮助与借鉴</strong></span></p>
<p><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong><strong>注：</strong>为避免企业信息泄漏相关信息会进行脱敏，如<strong>后续公司</strong>均以fsdm来代替，相关平台与技术细节做模糊与省略处理等。如有细节探讨可联系博主</strong></span></p>
<p><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>

<div data-page-id="Xdwgd7EsSogPQXxKUjXcIWbnnwd" data-lark-html-role="root" data-docx-has-block-data="true">
<h1 class="heading-1">一、背景与目标</h1>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-JrJkdLgPAoK5htx40e5cInhNnAh">分析fsdm当前可观测性建设现状，识别核心痛点，并提出系统性的解决方案，使可观测性能力更有效地在业务中应用与落地，最终实现：</div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-QMjhdNfWbobfrPxQRZlct4BhnXu" data-list="bullet"><strong>提升故障排查效率</strong>：缩短报警问题定位时间</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-ZCFCdKnIfoj2zDxMM3KctUumnkg" data-list="bullet"><strong>优化排查体验</strong>：构建统一的可观测性平台，提升研发和运维团队的工作效率</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PVPsdGbzcozZtAxAtiBce2HZnjd" data-list="bullet"><strong>增强业务保障能力</strong>：通过预测性监控进行提前预警</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PVPsdGbzcozZtAxAtiBce2HZnjd" data-list="bullet"><strong>为企业长期架构演进提供技术基座</strong>：设计可观测性平台架构，通过逐步演进以达到最终理想架构</li>
</ul>
<h1 class="heading-1">二、现状分析</h1>
<h2 class="heading-2">2.1、已具备能力</h2>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PnkndJfkQoIz14xoJ4zcDbdRnid">fsdm在可观测性建设方面已具备三大核心能力：</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-TXzudzbJWoOQZzxITi6ccVXKnkf">✅ <strong>日志串联（Logging）</strong></div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-VKA6dSGw3ou2ImxpzobcmHSonDb">- 完成了分布式日志收集与聚合</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-YtAmdbv81oGhngxxegBc2WMhnJc">- 支持链路trace的日志查询与分析</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-VxFOdf8cboNy0FxXI75c9UHBnHe">✅ <strong>链路追踪（Tracing）</strong></div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-YzDRdhMyDoCeeXxVkbncdMGanyd">- 利用Tracing相关平台</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-ZywMdwuwJo59GsxPqj9crEADnQf">- 实现了分布式调用链跟踪</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EPe4d2cS0ohwMsxxbZGcrob9niZ">✅ <strong>监控告警（Metrics）</strong></div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-XWiUdHNVcoXpccx740acSTOfnQh">- 建立了基础监控指标体系</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-TdL1dwf9do8Ic3xoYeicjTYLnnf">- 配置了关键业务告警规则</div>
<h2 class="heading-2">2.2、核心问题识别</h2>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-KTFqd2CYKoZyBjx2UxUc3D5qnJb">基础设施相对完善，但存在以下关键问题：</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-RG1RdYVpaoCnQ2xoGPGcngcvnac"><strong>🔥 业务利用率不足</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-RUCpddijWotE6Mxh3kzc9I4Hnhg" data-list="bullet">研发团队仍主要依赖传统日志查看方式</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-IQoVdZwNroBnmDx4ISQctH64nUf" data-list="bullet">可观测性工具在故障排查中的使用率不高</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-T1NDdSaGyoFJSHxEhzDcimYQnFf" data-list="bullet">直接影响问题排查效率，平均定位时间较长</li>
</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-SMQUdulrcodGlOx89fxcz2cSnFd"><strong>🔥 数据孤岛严重</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-LcYvdmFdPoqrBsxlHwjcpG6Rny3" data-list="bullet">Metrics/Tracing/Logging三大能力相互分离</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-OemndbClUoksJKxlJn6cvCkgnpX" data-list="bullet">缺乏统一的关联分析能力</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-XKVod9p34oFychx3uZWci0EOnJ3" data-list="bullet">无法形成完整的问题排查闭环</li>
</ul>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-NjWgd5MZDoasBLxqzRJcwAOHnn5"><strong>🔥 平台体验割裂</strong></div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-YKpmdLMWVoR4INxUP6ichO7enBh" data-list="bullet">告警通知与分析平台未打通</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-TRgzd20bnoHMq0x66Onc98YDnde" data-list="bullet">如：超时告警无法在Tracing平台直接关联分析</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-GKpqdclRLoXYL4xUTfHcLda6nUy" data-list="bullet">用户需要在多个平台间切换，操作复杂度高</li>
</ul>

<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-TFqRdvlEaoxeWxxDNTucXsw7nUc">&nbsp;</div>
<h1 class="heading-1">三、根因分析</h1>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-GtbUdhkbhoMyfux5TLdcQ5RxnSg">对当前情况调研与分析，可观测性利用率不高的根本原因可归纳为以下三个层面：</div>
<h2 class="heading-2">3.1、体验层面：不好用</h2>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-QpmDdHXTPo2RDkx0lMecrxOXncf" data-list="bullet"><strong>工具链割裂</strong>：三大可观测性能力未深度集成，数据割裂并且缺乏统一入口</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-U8bNdfs1VoHYhDxJXNhcDTONnFh" data-list="bullet"><strong>操作路径冗长</strong>：从告警到根因定位需要跨多个平台，操作复杂</li>
</ul>
<h2 class="heading-2">3.2、能力层面：有问题</h2>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-SlVTd7kQDoywf7xTPjKcK2Nnnyc" data-list="bullet"><strong>Trace能力缺陷</strong>：对长链路、轮训线程、MQ等场景支持不友好</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Qb8Id8bMNow89ex76QIcilRmnpd" data-list="bullet"><strong>采样策略问题</strong>：动态采样机制存在缺陷，导致关键告警数据无法查到（可能，需排查）</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-XdVTdrSWpoQ59UxaT1mcAFL7nQc" data-list="bullet"><strong>数据准确性问题</strong>：如单个TraceID可能关联到全天数据，影响分析准确性</li>
</ul>
<h1 class="heading-1">四、解决与演进方案</h1>
<blockquote class=" old-record-id-JG4fdzB0JowtlwxMJRpclaMJntc" data-type="quote_container">
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-ViiHdu55ZoQrk3xGKDxci668nOc">目前fsdm可观测性建设已具备良好基础，但需要系统性地解决当前的核心痛点。基于问题的紧急程度和影响范围采用分阶段解决策略，优先解决核心痛点，然后探索构建智能化体系，最终进行整体架构升级构建可观测性平台。</div>
</blockquote>

<h2 class="heading-2">4.1、第一阶段：解决核心痛点，整合三大能力</h2>
<p data-list="number">&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="heading-3"><strong>4.1.1、修复关键技术问题</strong></h3>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PihHdDhXbo6i0WxlEdzcbsyNneb" data-list="bullet">
<div>采样策略优化</div>
<ul class="list-bullet2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-M3IbdHfTVo2142xiblMciEbVnng" data-list="bullet">排查并修复为何存在报警在Tracing平台无法查到问题</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-WuTtdqaz6oDzV4x8nKRcxqQ1nsh" data-list="bullet">关键业务路径：强制采样？</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-TrvodknIBodBfuxpKNWclgF0nvf" data-list="bullet">
<div>数据准确性保障</div>
<ul class="list-bullet2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Z6yTdR82qoP2KvxbTfmcXJMInGf" data-list="bullet">异步场景支持优化</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-T5nadqhADo5yP4xdcNucmqrmn4V" data-list="bullet">TraceID生命周期管理？</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-SnSodFJ6AorPrExGFzWcVT1EnVb" data-list="bullet">
<div>服务流程自动化</div>
<ul class="list-bullet2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-XPaxdTVbmoAUh2xBqmaclOg1nOf" data-list="bullet">服务自动录入，减少申请流程</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-list="number">&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="heading-3"><strong>4.1.2、完成三大能力深度集成</strong></h3>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<div class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-RV5rdHtnao2ChLxQYKTchAO6n1n" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="{&quot;items&quot;:[{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;8ad5c7d1-a911-44b6-81a5-614dfc3c7778&quot;,&quot;height&quot;:811,&quot;width&quot;:741,&quot;currHeight&quot;:811,&quot;currWidth&quot;:741,&quot;natrualHeight&quot;:811,&quot;natrualWidth&quot;:741,&quot;pluginName&quot;:&quot;imageUpload&quot;,&quot;scale&quot;:1,&quot;src&quot;:&quot;https%3A%2F%2Finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2Fspace%2Fapi%2Fbox%2Fstream%2Fdownload%2Fpreview%2FD2Tobsc5AoaJykxlKoXcoJPPnyc%2F%3Fpreview_type%3D16&quot;,&quot;file_token&quot;:&quot;D2Tobsc5AoaJykxlKoXcoJPPnyc&quot;,&quot;image_type&quot;:&quot;image/png&quot;,&quot;size&quot;:60060,&quot;comments&quot;:[]}]}">&nbsp;</div>

<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-GqQGdJJaroAPVBxrR3XcDU86nfi" data-list="bullet">深度集成MTL三大套件 以Tracing为核心，实现三大数据源关联，提供关联分析能力</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-TC5WdRUS5oKnlRx3pg6cwOSKngc" data-list="bullet">
<div>Logging升级（原Logging仅支持到Trace Id埋入关联升级为）</div>
<ul class="list-bullet2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Z8iEdE2ihogVwAxVcjzcZeURnze" data-list="bullet">Trace Id埋入关联</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-EY5xd8rPnoI5Wrxi2OqcrptMnuh" data-list="bullet">Tracing异常日志收集（使errlog具备一键链路追踪能力）</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Y2hGdz9OFo424Lx9hBLcfAkanyn" data-list="bullet">
<div>业务日志与Tracing深度结合</div>
<ul class="list-bullet3">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-G3ABdicH7o1omkxrOuZcaFmJn2y" data-list="bullet">Log -&gt; span</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-GQKLd8YhZoIewnxMKvAc2s9rn0e" data-list="bullet">
<div>Metrics升级（原Metrics独立服务升级为）</div>
<ul class="list-bullet2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-KbktdwW4voashQxPUIpcrUe4nnd" data-list="bullet">
<div>技术监控与告警指标 ，依托Tracing进行处理（不再独立服务）</div>
<ul class="list-bullet3">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-TCWSdj3t1oy2WyxWepoc6JmJn0g" data-list="bullet">理论目前已有能力支撑</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-UGnTdGKl5o1QKOxUhH5ceoURnZY" data-list="bullet">
<div>业务指标Tracing收集，支持关联链路（原Tracing收集百分比不变）</div>
<ul class="list-bullet3">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PpLTde1vzo8P9Sx1FFpcUv51nfe" data-list="bullet">统一规范、统一数据（如转换为span）</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-list="number">&nbsp;</p>
<h2 class="heading-2">4.2、第二阶段：智能化升级与探索</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<div class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-XwB7dSu56oAOPgxzasTcLGaEnhd" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="{&quot;items&quot;:[{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;271e69a6-c7a1-4ca9-8f3e-8ceae7ba2bc1&quot;,&quot;height&quot;:152,&quot;width&quot;:803,&quot;currHeight&quot;:152,&quot;currWidth&quot;:803,&quot;natrualHeight&quot;:152,&quot;natrualWidth&quot;:803,&quot;pluginName&quot;:&quot;imageUpload&quot;,&quot;scale&quot;:1,&quot;src&quot;:&quot;https%3A%2F%2Finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2Fspace%2Fapi%2Fbox%2Fstream%2Fdownload%2Fpreview%2FTyaIbpIq3oarcWxl0MScRpWtnCf%2F%3Fpreview_type%3D16&quot;,&quot;file_token&quot;:&quot;TyaIbpIq3oarcWxl0MScRpWtnCf&quot;,&quot;image_type&quot;:&quot;image/png&quot;,&quot;size&quot;:34616,&quot;comments&quot;:[]}]}">
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1211814/202507/1211814-20250714172651723-2097002156.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<p data-list="number">&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="heading-3"><strong>4.2.1、短期智能化能力</strong></h3>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<ol class="list-number1" start="1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-HF6idDQ9aoGVdAxRdZIcDWEFnKg" data-list="number">接口/链路安全智能分析与预警</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Rl9OdRzpcoySMxxgDsncB0ahnIg" data-list="number">
<div>告警降噪</div>
<ol class="list-number2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-UfpgdNgewocS7MxhejGcBeJ7nNd" data-list="number">基于历史数据训练降噪模型</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-LN1Hdai4Po47BixcYamcu3Zjnsg" data-list="number">支持告警聚合和根因分析</li>
</ol></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-XEyLdBBy7oyDoaxzPKvcpnlnnoh" data-list="number">
<div>智能排查建议</div>
<ol class="list-number2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-DwKadPSaGou2BSxGAIqc1WJWnse" data-list="number">API错误率上升 → 推荐查看网关日志+依赖服务状态</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-LiYLdwhxroLlJCxjQbyccwN4ngd" data-list="number">响应时间异常 → 自动分析数据库慢查询+缓存命中率</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-CXU1dr9VWouwb8xqHpwc3JIsnJe" data-list="number">服务不可用 → 检查上下游服务拓扑+资源使用情况</li>
</ol></li>
</ol>
<p data-list="number">&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="heading-3"><strong>4.2.2、长期AIOps构建</strong></h3>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-UVvndNbrfo4WuixcgOZctR1Rnhe">构建AIOps引擎（降低人为分析成本）降低人为分析成本：预测容量瓶颈、自动定位根因，异常传播分析</div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-U5cDd9Hn3oBzUwxfPT3c2I52nZe" data-list="bullet">
<div>基于历史流量与资源指标，预警容量瓶颈</div>
<ul class="list-bullet2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-URKcdma7yovNbTx0Bkscs2yZn3g" data-list="bullet">基于历史流量预测资源需求，提前1-2周预警容量瓶颈</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-BbTXdtkHdoLpNOxANKOcybTtnSf" data-list="bullet">整合拓扑关系+指标波动+日志异常，生成根因概率评分（如：MySQL慢查询导致API超时：置信度92%）</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-O9dbdg6yQoERoTxGYRec4DignPe" data-list="bullet">基于服务拓扑的异常传播路径识别，预测故障影响范围，自动生成应急响应建议</li>
</ul>
<p data-list="number">&nbsp;</p>
<h2 class="heading-2">4.3、第三阶段：构建可观测性平台理想架构体系</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<div class="image-uploaded gallery old-record-id-RcThd62k7odKWYxfrLRcumeUnAd" data-type="image" data-ace-gallery-json="{&quot;items&quot;:[{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;702ac359-6a5e-4796-a61e-8602a5d9ecd4&quot;,&quot;height&quot;:708,&quot;width&quot;:1245,&quot;currHeight&quot;:708,&quot;currWidth&quot;:1245,&quot;natrualHeight&quot;:708,&quot;natrualWidth&quot;:1245,&quot;pluginName&quot;:&quot;imageUpload&quot;,&quot;scale&quot;:1,&quot;src&quot;:&quot;https%3A%2F%2Finternal-api-drive-stream.feishu.cn%2Fspace%2Fapi%2Fbox%2Fstream%2Fdownload%2Fpreview%2FRebebf5lforugxxPYifcmjfQnMe%2F%3Fpreview_type%3D16&quot;,&quot;file_token&quot;:&quot;Rebebf5lforugxxPYifcmjfQnMe&quot;,&quot;image_type&quot;:&quot;image/png&quot;,&quot;size&quot;:278478,&quot;comments&quot;:[]}]}">
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1211814/202507/1211814-20250714172715760-293234637.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<ol class="list-number1" start="1">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Nw2hdPzsdoCsdpxmBenceGevn6d" data-list="number">
<div>采用存储与计算分离架构</div>
<ol class="list-number2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-TkCddEPAzoelk8xuOXJcRTG8nfb" data-list="bullet">通过存储与计算分离的架构体系，降低系统各模块之间的耦合度，从而显著提高服务的可用性和稳定性。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-VS0rdY3UCoeZRuxp8h1cdMTXnLf" data-list="bullet">增强架构的扩展能力，能够灵活应对业务增长和数据量扩大的需求。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-RnkKdXV47omySlxFotqcqjv1nFe" data-list="bullet">保证架构设计清晰，易于理解和维护，降低开发和运维成本。</li>
</ol></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-MkUOdVRw4osNbxxArZLcKzDInDh" data-list="number">
<div>数据采集与处理</div>
<ol class="list-number2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-P4F6dLvJBoxsaNxnp1gcH8fMnuc" data-list="number">
<div>数据采集与同步</div>
<ol class="list-number3">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-VyeNd37CNoPAtBx9iDQcU7QZnih" data-list="bullet">利用OB Client对业务服务进行高效的数据采集，并将采集到的数据同步至OB数据中心。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PrXVdaDvpoi3BzxZGRqcxgYTnVd" data-list="bullet">数据同步模式可灵活选择为推送（Push）或拉取（Pull），具体实现细节待进一步确定。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-UGOIdB58Qo54erxddpXcVa65ncf" data-list="bullet">OB Client的能力提供方式可采用SDK或Agent的形式，具体实现方案需根据业务需求和技术可行性进行评估和选择。</li>
</ol></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-MyLRdKKykoQabsxoWRwcy3nmnlf" data-list="number">
<div>数据清洗与存储</div>
<ol class="list-number3">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Icsed4VLro4dLwxh9kscvSxUnIb" data-list="bullet">在OB数据中心对采集到的原始数据进行深度清洗，去除噪声数据和无效信息，确保数据质量。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-W3EFdVywUoVdrcxSBvycZt4Fnzh" data-list="bullet">将清洗后的数据按照统一的模型进行存储落地，为后续的数据分析和应用提供基础。</li>
</ol></li>
</ol></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-ECkadINSjo9WeSxxwCLcsDvNnQc" data-list="number">
<div>平台能力</div>
<ol class="list-number2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-OSSsddoNwocoYmxMGsPcN7Q6nZd" data-list="number">
<div>MTL可视化平台</div>
<ol class="list-number3">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-M49vdnY7loxbrJxE6IrcPF61nWc" data-list="bullet">依托OB数据中心强大的数据处理和存储能力，针对不同业务场景进行针对性的计算和分析。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-V1SidpGa3or4FZxPDlncea4Dn2g" data-list="bullet">仅是一种ui表现形式，可以是阿里云相关平台、开源系统自行部署等等</li>
</ol></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-DIFbdsbljo7Wc8xkNntcmXxxnJb" data-list="number">
<div>AIOPS智能化插件</div>
<ol class="list-number3">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-WiKRdRUAdo2SO9xSWn0cVtJxnhS" data-list="bullet">提供AIOPS智能化插件，增强平台的分析能力，提高运维效率和系统的稳定性。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-JhWwd2Ik3o0WdGx1C0aczc83nyh" data-list="bullet">如智能化分析、自动化故障检测、诊断和预测、接口/链路安全智能分析与预警</li>
</ol></li>
</ol></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-HzjLdL8bXoyxZRxRjRpc4l99nxd" data-list="number">
<div>平台赋能与集成</div>
<ol class="list-number2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-W4gEd3rzqo45mNxG9xacx0kpnbf" data-list="number">
<div>发布平台集成</div>
<ol class="list-number3">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-VtG3dtaEBoDvq1xO8IFcR0XVnIV" data-list="bullet">发布平台可进行能力集成，通过识别发布节点的链路情况，实现问题的快速识别和定位。</li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-PLkRddeYzouzilx9Lnoc4mLfnIb" data-list="bullet">在发布过程中实时监控业务指标，及时发现潜在问题，保障发布过程的顺利。</li>
</ol></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-NRycdhrYso4pIyxG3yVczab5nVh" data-list="number">
<div>自动化测试结果分析</div>
<ol class="list-number3">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Dliyd8vn6oaBbmxLWJNcgvMGnFg" data-list="bullet">自动化测试平台可进行能力集成，支持对自动化测试结果的链路分析，加快问题定位时间、降低人工分析成本</li>
</ol></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-LVs0dcr5uo2NR5xuyYeckntKnke" data-list="number">
<div>用户行为分析赋能</div>
<ol class="list-number3">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-Uep8dbMRFoLrAGxsLYHcarpvnFe" data-list="bullet">可为用户行为分析提供一定的数据基础</li>
</ol></li>
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-WEfed40ACoOWzWxEIC2chGHSnC1" data-list="number">
<div>安全风控赋能</div>
<ol class="list-number3">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-MCTVddD8Ko9JMnxH1CjcsxJCnQe" data-list="bullet">可为安全风控提供数据支持和决策依据。</li>
</ol></li>
</ol></li>
</ol>
<div data-page-id="Xdwgd7EsSogPQXxKUjXcIWbnnwd" data-lark-html-role="root" data-docx-has-block-data="false">
<div>
<p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;5. 更深一步</p>
</div>
<ul class="list-bullet1">
<li style="list-style-type: none">
<ul class="list-bullet2">
<li class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-TYAYd1OrYoSQJ9xZSLzcl7Zknkb" data-list="bullet">可与db中间件等相关做MTL集成，打造<span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>业务+技术 可观测性一体化平台</strong></span></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<h1 class="heading-1">五、总结与思考</h1>
<div class="zoneType-calloutBlock old-record-id-EiXodXbyNo6QWyxRDaBcnhLsnbf">
<div class="callout-container" data-emoji-id="deciduous_tree">
<div class="callout-block">
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-W49Jd8jZ3ogj8zxh71Xc4qh9nGb">可观测性建设过程中的数据孤岛问题，其实在业界也是一个<strong>普遍性问题</strong>。从该案例中可以发现，数据孤岛的形成往往是<strong>历史演进</strong>的结果，不同可观测性能力在不同阶段各自发展，后续数据未进行互联互通。</div>
<div class="ace-line ace-line old-record-id-K9ySdbmuOoC29xxMC6bce19AnBb">更进一步，从可观测性延伸看，当前的基础设施能力已<strong>相对完善</strong>，关键挑战在于<strong>能力的整合与打通</strong>。后续架构分析与设计中，<strong>应着重考虑并解决这一问题</strong>。</div>
